overview: The Lucas Men all want to hit it big, but if they're going to make it in the business world they first need to learn how to Undress For Success! Tomas Brand takes over the meeting with Donato Reyes and fucks him in the ass. Scott Hunter and Goran have a nighttime affair after their car breaks down. The high-powered business couple Edji Da Silva and Will Helm has sex after work. Damien Crosse and Davidenko Lopez strip off their suits for a quick fling before a business dinner. And Paul Walker shows Logan Rogue who is boss with his big hard cock. The only way to make it in this world is to Undress For Success!
title: Gentlemen 7: Undress for Success
